options.content: Resource Overview

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: 容器总能耗(单位千瓦时)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: 节点数量

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: 容器数量

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU 使用率

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: 100 * (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint="/", fstype!="nfs4", fstype!="tmpfs", fstype!="overlay",instance="$node"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint="/", fstype!="nfs4", fstype!="tmpfs", fstype!="overlay",instance="$node"}))

panels.title: 磁盘使用率

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="system"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[5m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="user"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[5m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="iowait"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[5m])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode=~".*irq"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[5m])))

node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint="/", fstype!="nfs4", fstype!="tmpfs", fstype!="overlay", instance="$node"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint="/", fstype!="nfs4", fstype!="tmpfs", fstype!="overlay", instance="$node"}
